title: Is there any way I can find out which region/server a player is playing on?
body:
So I was playing on pbe and there was this troll that started trolling me and even convinced both my team and the other team to report me for seemingly no reason.
So the person even went so far that he even said that he was going to create a thread and banning me on both pbe and my real account, so I wanted to find out find out the person account name and the region he was playing on.

replies.body: As long as you're doing nothing that would cause others a negative experience, you have nothing to worry about.  False reports do not count.  Naming and shaming is also not permitted on the boards, so he won't have a pleasant time trying to shine unwanted spotlight on you, rest easy!  I don't recommend seeking out the other player, though.  Retaliation isn't okay, and not something we'll support.  Use the post game reporting tool and we can take it from there.
Ok thank you for the advice, have a great day.
